    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CommandLine
    The CommandLine class handles the parsing and execution of XML editor commands from the command-line interface.
    commandLineV2
    The commandLineV2 class processes and executes the commands provided in the command line.
    DataCompress
    The `DataCompress` class provides methods for performing compression and decompression using the Byte Pair Encoding (BPE) algorithm, as well as utilities for minification and map serialization.
    Functions
    The `Functions` interface provides static methods for manipulating and analyzing XML data, converting XML to JSON, compressing and decompressing data, drawing social network graphs, performing network analysis, and conducting search operations on the data.
    Graph
    The `Graph` class represents a directed graph where vertices (users) are connected by edges (follower relationships).
    mainApplication
    The mainApplication class handles the functionality of an XML editor application.
    Menu
    The `Menu` class provides functionality for managing the main menu of the XML Editor application.
    NetworkAnalysis
    The `NetworkAnalysis` class provides methods to analyze and retrieve information about a social network.
    NetworkAnalysisController
    Controller class for handling the interactions in the network analysis UI.
    search
    Utility class for searching specific words and topics within XML-like data represented as an array of strings.
    SearchController
    Controller for handling search-related actions and theme toggling in the XML editor.
    Start
    The Start class serves as the main entry point for the XML Editor application.
    Suggest
    The Suggest class provides functionality to suggest friends for users in a social network based on their followers and their followers' connections.
    XMLChecker
    The XMLChecker class is used to validate XML content by checking if all tags are properly nested and matched.
    XMLFixer
    A utility class for fixing XML content by ensuring that all tags are properly opened and closed.
    XMLFormatter
    A utility class for formatting XML content to improve its readability by adding proper indentation based on the structure of the XML tags.
    XMLHandler
    The XMLHandler class provides utility methods for handling XML content in the form of a list of XML lines.
    XMLTagsTracker
    The XMLTagsTracker class is designed to manage and track the occurrence of XML tags.
    XMLTagUtils
    Utility class providing methods for manipulating and analyzing XML tags.
